message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This price reflects the product's value and allows us both to reach a fair agreement. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,000 and $10,500. Would you consider $9,750?

Bob, I'm still trying to figure out a way to make this work for both of us. $9,750 is a step in the right direction, but I'm still hoping to get closer to $10,500.  Would you consider $10,000?  This would be a fair price that allows us both to move forward. Let me know what you think.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,800, but I don't think I can go any higher. This is my final offer. Can you meet me at $9,800?
